assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: IPEVO Corporation engages in the design, research and development, and sale of computer peripheral hardware products. The company offers DO-CAM video collaboration cameras, V4K video teaching/collaboration cameras, HDMI/USB dual mode teaching cameras, wireless and video teaching cameras, uplift video phone holders, mirror cameras for laptops, flip learning mirrors, and teaching camera bags. It also provides IPEVO EyeStage, an AI smart video application software specially designed for video camera series; IPEVO Visualizer software; IPEVO CamControl that could control the basic functions of IPEVO video teaching cameras, as well as adjust camera image settings; IPEVO Annotator, which includes screen snapshots, screen recording, and other functions, as well as assits to draw or highlight points directly on the computer projection screen; IPEVO VirtualCam Controller that creates a virtual camera from live images transmitted by the camera and allows to mirror images and adjust keystone corrections; iDocCam Video Teaching APP that turns a smartphone into a video teaching camera; and IPEVO WHITEBOARD APP, a whiteboard software for showing, marking, drawing lines, doodles, and geometric figures. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.
